hadith.text: Narrated 'Aishah: The revelation came down to Messenger of Allah (ï·º) and he recited to is: "A surah which We have sent down and which We have ordained (faradnaha)" Abu Dawud said: The letter ra (r) is the word faradnaha has short vowel a (with out doubling of consonant r), and then he reached the verses after this verse
